testsuite.name: com.coffee.api.CoffeeAPITest

testcase.name: API should return a 204 when valid data has been sent through a POST request()

testsuite.system-out:
***** REQUEST: POST: /roasters ***** POST /roasters HTTP/1.1
{"name":"Verve Coffee","url":"https://vervecoffee.com","address":"Santa Cruz, CA"} Name: Verve Coffee, URL: https://vervecoffee.com, address: false ***** RESPONSE 204 to POST: /roasters ***** HTTP/1.1 204 No Content
